data.name: Makai Kingdom: Reclaimed and Rebound - Digital Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself into the beats of the Netherworld with the Makai Kingdom: Reclaimed and Rebound digital soundtrack!

01 - Makai Kingdom
02 - Royal Road
03 - Demon's Party
04 - The Duke of Darkness, King Drake the 3rd
05 - JOKER
06 - Whirling Malice

08 - Moment of Madness
09 - With Fighting Spirit in Your Heart
10 - Grand Finale
11 - Spark of Destiny
12 - Quiet Tension
13 - Running Through the Devil's Land
14 - First Battle
15 - The Universe Will be Mine
16 - Darkness Darkness
17 - Big Guest
18 - Alexander the God of Destruction
19 - Super Cool No.1
20 - An Overlord Appears
21 - Phantom Kingdom
22 - Burning Fighting Spirit
23 - I am a Boss!
24 - Salome the Traitor
25 - Sabat
26 - Netherworld Conquest
27 - Love-Desire-Affection
28 - MAKAI Fusion
